argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_csbrngVD | |- ( A e. C -> [_ A / x ]_ ran ( F |` B ) = ran [_ A / x ]_ ( F |` B ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_csbresgVD | |- ( A e. C -> [_ A / x ]_ ( F |` B ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ F |` [_ A / x ]_ B ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_rneqd | |- ( A e. C -> ran [_ A / x ]_ ( F |` B ) = ran ( [_ A / x ]_ F |` [_ A / x ]_ B ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. C -> [_ A / x ]_ ran ( F |` B ) = ran ( [_ A / x ]_ F |` [_ A / x ]_ B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( F " B ) = ran ( F |` B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_csbeq2i | |- [_ A / x ]_ ( F " B ) = [_ A / x ]_ ran ( F |` B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( [_ A / x ]_ F " [_ A / x ]_ B ) = ran ( [_ A / x ]_ F |` [_ A / x ]_ B ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( A e. C -> [_ A / x ]_ ( F " B ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ F " [_ A / x ]_ B ) ) |
\
 Move class substitution in and out of the image of a function.  The proof is derived from the virtual deduction proof ~ csbima12gALTVD . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 10-Nov-2012.)  Obsolete as of 20-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbfv12 instead.  (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
